#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int n,k;
int dp[1002];
bool vis[1002];

int f(int n)
{
    if ( vis[n] ) return dp[n];
    vis[n] = true;
    set <int> s;
    for ( int i = 1; i <= n; i++ ) {
        if ( i + k - 1 > n ) break;
        s.insert(f(i-1)^f(n - i - k + 1));
    }
    int cnt = 0;
    while ( s.find(cnt) != s.end() ) cnt++;
    dp[n] = cnt;
    return cnt;
}

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin >> t >> k;
    while ( t-- ){
        cin >> n;
        if ( f(n) ) puts("Brainy");
        else puts("Clumsy");
    }
    return 0;
}
